email-filter-whitelist.name: Sign-Up email filtering (whitelist)
email-filter-whitelist.description: This template only allows signup with emails from specified domains.

question.name: DOMAINWHITELIST
question.message: Enter a comma-delimited list of allowed email domains (example: 'mydomain.com, myotherdomain.com').

email-filter-blacklist.name: Sign-Up email filtering (blacklist)
email-filter-blacklist.description: This template prevents signup with emails from specified domains.

question.name: DOMAINBLACKLIST
question.message: Enter a comma-delimited list of disallowed email domains (example: 'mydomain.com, myotherdomain.com').
